enumeratedValues.name: ADCH_25

enumeratedValues.name: ADCH_31
enumeratedValues.description: Conversion Disabled. Hardware Triggers will not initiate any conversion.

enumeratedValues.name: AIEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Conversion complete interrupt disabled

enumeratedValues.name: AIEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Conversion complete interrupt enabled

R0.name: R0
R0.description: Data result register for HW triggers

R%s.name: R%s
R%s.description: Data result register for HW triggers

enumeratedValues.name: ADICLK_0
enumeratedValues.description: IPG clock

enumeratedValues.name: ADICLK_1
enumeratedValues.description: IPG clock divided by 2

enumeratedValues.name: ADICLK_3
enumeratedValues.description: Asynchronous clock (ADACK)

enumeratedValues.name: MODE_0
enumeratedValues.description: 8-bit conversion

enumeratedValues.name: MODE_1
enumeratedValues.description: 10-bit conversion

enumeratedValues.name: MODE_2
enumeratedValues.description: 12-bit conversion

enumeratedValues.name: ADLSMP_0
enumeratedValues.description: Short sample mode.

enumeratedValues.name: ADLSMP_1
enumeratedValues.description: Long sample mode.

enumeratedValues.name: ADIV_0
enumeratedValues.description: Input clock

enumeratedValues.name: ADIV_1
enumeratedValues.description: Input clock / 2

enumeratedValues.name: ADIV_2
enumeratedValues.description: Input clock / 4

enumeratedValues.name: ADIV_3
enumeratedValues.description: Input clock / 8

enumeratedValues.name: ADLPC_0
enumeratedValues.description: ADC hard block not in low power mode.

enumeratedValues.name: ADLPC_1
enumeratedValues.description: ADC hard block in low power mode.

ADSTS.name: ADSTS
ADSTS.description: Defines the total sample time duration in number of full cycles

enumeratedValues.name: ADSTS_0
enumeratedValues.description: Sample period (ADC clocks) = 3 if ADLSMP=0b Sample period (ADC clocks) = 13 if ADLSMP=1b

enumeratedValues.name: ADSTS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Sample period (ADC clocks) = 5 if ADLSMP=0b Sample period (ADC clocks) = 17 if ADLSMP=1b

enumeratedValues.name: ADSTS_2
enumeratedValues.description: Sample period (ADC clocks) = 7 if ADLSMP=0b Sample period (ADC clocks) = 21 if ADLSMP=1b

enumeratedValues.name: ADSTS_3
enumeratedValues.description: Sample period (ADC clocks) = 9 if ADLSMP=0b Sample period (ADC clocks) = 25 if ADLSMP=1b

enumeratedValues.name: ADHSC_0
enumeratedValues.description: Normal conversion selected.

enumeratedValues.name: ADHSC_1
enumeratedValues.description: High speed conversion selected.

enumeratedValues.name: REFSEL_0
enumeratedValues.description: Selects VREFH/VREFL as reference voltage.

enumeratedValues.name: ADTRG_0
enumeratedValues.description: Software trigger selected

enumeratedValues.name: ADTRG_1
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware trigger selected

enumeratedValues.name: AVGS_0
enumeratedValues.description: 4 samples averaged

enumeratedValues.name: AVGS_1
enumeratedValues.description: 8 samples averaged

enumeratedValues.name: AVGS_2
enumeratedValues.description: 16 samples averaged

enumeratedValues.name: AVGS_3
enumeratedValues.description: 32 samples averaged

enumeratedValues.name: OVWREN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Disable the overwriting. Existing Data in Data result register will not be overwritten by subsequent converted data.

enumeratedValues.name: OVWREN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Enable the overwriting.

enumeratedValues.name: ADACKEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Asynchronous clock output disabled; Asynchronous clock only enabled if selected by ADICLK and a conversion is active.

enumeratedValues.name: ADACKEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Asynchronous clock and clock output enabled regardless of the state of the ADC

enumeratedValues.name: DMAEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: DMA disabled (default)

enumeratedValues.name: DMAEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: DMA enabled

enumeratedValues.name: ACREN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Range function disabled. Only the compare value 1 of ADC_CV register (CV1) is compared.

enumeratedValues.name: ACREN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Range function enabled. Both compare values of ADC_CV registers (CV1 and CV2) are compared.

enumeratedValues.name: ACFGT_0
enumeratedValues.description: Configures "Less Than Threshold, Outside Range Not Inclusive and Inside Range Not Inclusive" functionality based on the values placed in the ADC_CV register.

enumeratedValues.name: ACFGT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Configures "Greater Than Or Equal To Threshold, Outside Range Inclusive and Inside Range Inclusive" functionality based on the values placed in the ADC_CV registers.

enumeratedValues.name: ACFE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Compare function disabled

enumeratedValues.name: ACFE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Compare function enabled

enumeratedValues.name: AVGE_0
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware average function disabled

enumeratedValues.name: AVGE_1
enumeratedValues.description: Hardware average function enabled

enumeratedValues.name: ADCO_0
enumeratedValues.description: One conversion or one set of conversions if the hardware average function is enabled (AVGE=1) after initiating a conversion.

enumeratedValues.name: ADCO_1
enumeratedValues.description: Continuous conversions or sets of conversions if the hardware average function is enabled (AVGE=1) after initiating a conversion.

enumeratedValues.name: ADACT_0
enumeratedValues.description: Conversion not in progress.

enumeratedValues.name: ADACT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Conversion in progress.

enumeratedValues.name: CALF_0
enumeratedValues.description: Calibration completed normally.

enumeratedValues.name: CALF_1
enumeratedValues.description: Calibration failed. ADC accuracy specifications are not guaranteed.

enumeratedValues.name: AWKST_0
enumeratedValues.description: No asynchronous interrupt.

enumeratedValues.name: AWKST_1
enumeratedValues.description: Asynchronous wake up interrupt occurred in stop mode.

enumeratedValues.name: SIGN_0
enumeratedValues.description: The offset value is added with the raw result

enumeratedValues.name: SIGN_1
enumeratedValues.description: The offset value is subtracted from the raw converted value
